answers.answer: you should go to your doctor or hospital you may be dehydrated and need to go on a drip

There is also a small chance that you may have a complication like high blood pressure / preeclampsia which needs to be detected and treated.Please go see your doctor asap.If you can't see your doctor, go to Labor and Delivery for checkup.

question: I'm 36 weeks had contractions for 2 days can't keep food down headache for 2 weeks and can't sleep what should I do please help
title: very worried
